name: Majority Rules
description:
Majority rules is a casual party drinking game where players vote on statements and drink if they're in the minority vote. Designed to play on mobile browser.

There are 70+ unique statements that will be shuffled randomly with each new game.

You can play this game for free but if you like my work you can support it by buying me a coffee here at kofi! https://ko-fi.com/catchall
